title: PBE Account Name
body:
Hey Riot, my PBE account was recently de-activated because it was an older account. What happened was...

My live account had pbe access.
My old PBE account had pbe access.

Then...

Old PBE account deactivated.

I signed up for PBE access through an e-mail sent to tell me to activate my PBE account with my live account.

As a result...

Cardi (PBE) still exists and belonged to my live account BEFORE the old account wipe.

And...

My only remaining PBE account's name is "Leblanc Main" and I can't change it to "Cardi".

replies.body: Adding you because all LeBlanc mains are awesome.
aw, stay awesome though. LeBlanc mains are just so cool thats why.

Looking into this, I see you do still have an active PBE account; however, old content and summoner names from these legacy accounts will not transfer over to live PBE accounts.  You can still login to your PBE account tied to the live account you are posting from.  It's currently not possible to swap the Summoner Names, but you should be able to change your name through the PBE in-client store.  Hope that helps clarify things!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gOR73auO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-06T16:30:16.995+0000)
>
> Looking into this, I see you do still have an active PBE account; however, old content and summoner names from these legacy accounts will not transfer over to live PBE accounts.  You can still login to your PBE account tied to the live account you are posting from.  It's currently not possible to swap the Summoner Names, but you should be able to change your name through the PBE in-client store.  Hope that helps clarify things!

That really sucks. I've used my real name for my summoner name for almost as long as I've been playing League.

That's understandable, and I'd like to see if we could do more about this. Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll review your case to see what we can do.  We'll respond as soon as we can!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gOR73auO,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-06T16:49:03.746+0000)
>
> That's understandable, and I'd like to see if we could do more about this. Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll review your case to see what we can do.  We'll respond as soon as we can!

Thanks Poro :^)
